attributes.action: dissolve parliament and call a general election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This Government has proved to be completely inept and seems to have no ideas except to hang on for another year.
The House of Commons in general is populated with self serving MPs, who nobody now trusts. To call each other honourable or right honourable is a joke.Parliament needs fumigating.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
